translations: 把……砍首（behead 的现在分词形式）

sentences.translation: 斩首和断肢行为极为普遍。

sentences.sentence: Punishments include beheadings, amputations and stoning people to death.
sentences.translation: 惩罚方法包括斩首，截肢和用石头把人砸死。

sentences.sentence: Quite probably "Warriors of the Rainbow" also has the highest number of graphic beheadings of any film anywhere.
sentences.translation: 完全可以想象“着彩虹的勇士”电影的任何地方还具有数量最多的逼真的斩首场面。
